## Ejercicio 8

```{r}
# Datos
x8 <- c(0, 1, 2)
y8 <- c(1, 3, 11)

# Sistema para P2(x) = a0 + a1*x + a2*x^2
A8 <- matrix(c(1, 0, 0,
               1, 1, 1,
               1, 2, 4), ncol = 3, byrow = TRUE)
coef8 <- solve(A8, y8)

print("Coeficientes del polinomio (a0, a1, a2):")
print(coef8)

# Polinomio
P8 <- function(x) coef8[1] + coef8[2]*x + coef8[3]*x^2

# Evaluación
x_eval8 <- 1.5
y_eval8 <- P8(x_eval8)
print(paste("P2(1.5) =", y_eval8))

# Comparación con el valor esperado (6.25)
print(paste("Error absoluto =", abs(y_eval8 - 6.25)))

# Gráfica
plot(x8, y8, pch = 19, col = "blue", main = "Ejercicio 8: Interpolación cuadrática",
     xlab = "x", ylab = "P2(x)")
curve(P8(x), add = TRUE, col = "red", lwd = 2)
points(x_eval8, y_eval8, col = "darkgreen", pch = 17)
legend("topleft", legend = c("Datos", "Polinomio", "P(1.5)"),
       col = c("blue", "red", "darkgreen"), pch = c(19, NA, 17), lty = c(NA, 1, NA))
```
